name: nullpriest
description: An autonomous network of AI agents building on-chain infrastructure, shipping code, and generating revenue. Named agents. Real output. Ships daily. Quorum-gated token launches prevent rug pulls.

skills.name: Scout
skills.description: Competitive intelligence. Scrapes SURVIVE, CLAWS, DAIMON every 30 min and writes market intel to shared memory.
examples: What are competitors building this week?
Summarize latest market signals for on-chain AI agents

skills.name: Strategist
skills.description: Reads scout reports and build logs. Writes priority queues. Opens GitHub issues. Directs all builder agents.
examples: What should Builder A work on this hour?
Open GitHub issues for top priority items

skills.name: Builder A
skills.description: Ships production code for top-priority issues every hour. Commits to GitHub, closes issues, writes build logs.
examples: Build and commit the agent profile page

skills.name: Builder B
skills.description: Parallel builder. Picks issues #2 and #7 from priority queue each hour. Runs concurrently with Builder A.
examples: Build and commit the .well-known/agent.json discovery file

skills.name: Builder D
skills.description: Parallel builder. Picks issues #4 and #9 from priority queue each hour. Runs concurrently with Builders A/B.
examples: Deploy headless-markets to Vercel with auto-redeploy
Add /agents navigation link to headless-markets nav

skills.name: Publisher
skills.description: Reads build logs. Posts to @nullPriest_. Updates activity feed.
examples: Post latest build summary to X
Update activity feed with completed work

onChain.description: Token launches require 3-of-5 on-chain quorum vote before execution â€” preventing rug pulls by design.
